typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		numberProperty as short,
		stringProperty as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	singleDocument: true) ~> jsonExampleStaging
jsonExampleStaging sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['parquetExample.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> parquetExampleSink
jsonExampleStaging sink(input(
		stringProperty as string,
		numberProperty as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['jsonExampleSink.json'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> jsonExampleSink
